title: System Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Creative Economic Development for Cultivating Community Learning Designers

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Using SWOT analysis to assess community needs, learners propose three or more problem-solving strategies
In VR-based simulations, learners design creative economic models to develop two or more project ideas linked to local businesses
Through formative assessments, learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in community-based learning design competencies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
